text: Woakplɔ nɔviwò ŋutsuwo katã ɖe asi vɛ, woanɔ sɔwo dzi, woanɔ tasiaɖamwo me, woanɔ kekewo, tedzisɔwo kple kposɔwo dzi, tso dukɔwo katã dome ava nye to kɔkɔe, Yerusalem dzi abe vɔsa ene na Yehowa. Woatsɔ wo vɛ abe ale si Israelviwo tsɔa nuɖuvɔsa vaa Yehowa ƒe gbedoxɔ me ɖe agba gbadzɛwo me ene,
